sen.e: Given these disputes, the issue of the Northern and Southern Courts was an essential factor for studying whether the unbroken Imperial line and the emperor-centered historiography were based on the actual history.

sen.j: また、古事記や日本書紀などの古代史の研究が進むにつれて、考古学の成果により初期の天皇の実在に疑問がなされたり（欠史八代）、第26代の継体天皇の即位を王朝交代とする説がなされた（現在では、継体天皇は第25代までの天皇とは血のつながりがないとの説も存在する。）。
sen.e: As studies of Kojiki and Nihonshoki advanced, scholars began to doubt the existence of early emperors (Eight Undocumented Sovereigns), and some people released an idea that the Japanese dynasty was changed when 26th Emperor Keitai succeeded to the throne (according to a current study, Emperor Keitai had no blood relationship with emperors before him).

sen.cmt: 冠詞を修正しました。定冠詞を追加しました。
sen.e: As studies of the Kojiki and the Nihonshoki advanced, scholars began to doubt the existence of early emperors (Eight Undocumented Sovereigns), and some people released the idea that the Japanese dynasty was changed when the 26th Emperor Keitai succeeded to the throne (according to a current study, Emperor Keitai had no blood relationship with emperors before him).

sen.j: このように、戦前・戦後を通じて、歴史学の観点から万世一系が歴史的な事実であるかについて、疑問がなされてきた経緯がある。
sen.e: As described above, during both the prewar and the postwar periods, scholars often doubted validity of the unbroken Imperial line from the historical point of view.
As described above, during both the prewar and the postwar periods, scholars often doubted the validity of the unbroken Imperial line from the historical point of view.
As described above, during both the prewar and the postwar periods, scholars often doubted the validity of the unbroken Imperial line from the historical point of view.

sen.j: しかし、特に戦前では、不敬罪・治安維持法などの存在などから、皇室の権威にかかわる問題について論争が自由にできなかった。
sen.e: But, especially during the prewar period, an idea of lese majesty and the Peace Preservation Law prevented people from discussing validity of the unbroken Imperial line.
But, especially during the prewar period, the idea of lese majesty and the Peace Preservation Law prevented people from discussing the validity of the unbroken Imperial line.
But, especially during the prewar period, the idea of lese majesty and the Peace Preservation Law prevented people from discussing the validity of the unbroken Imperial line.

sen.j: 万世一系を否定する見解を徹底して主張した歴史家や知識人は、決して多くはなかった。
sen.e: Most of historians and intellectuals could not strongly insist their opinion that denied the unbroken imperial line.
Most historians and intellectuals could not insist their opinion that denied the unbroken Imperial line.
sen.cmt: 不要な箇所を削除しました。Imperialのiが小文字になっています。

tit.e: Relationship with the national structure
Relationship with the national structure
Relationship with the national structure

sen.j: 万世一系が天皇制の根拠とされていたので、いわゆる国体の問題でも深い影響を与えていた。
sen.e: The unbroken Imperial line was thought to be the essential factor to justify the emperor system, so it had a large influence on an issue of the national structure.
The unbroken Imperial line was thought to be an essential factor to justify the emperor system, so it had a large influence on the issue of national structure.
sen.cmt: 冠詞を修正、不要な箇所は削除しました。
sen.e: The unbroken Imperial line was thought to be an essential factor to justify the emperor system, so it had a large influence on the issue of national structure.

sen.j: 天皇機関説論争の際には、神勅が天皇による直接統治の根拠とされた。
sen.e: When an issue of the Emperor Organ Theory emerged, oracles became an evidence of emperors' reign.
When the issue of the Emperor Organ Theory emerged, oracles became the evidence for the emperors' reign.
sen.cmt: 冠詞、前置詞を修正しました。
sen.e: When the issue of the Emperor Organ Theory emerged, oracles became the evidence for the emperors' reign.

sen.j: 『国体の本義』でも、神勅や万世一系が冒頭で強調されている。
sen.e: The book "Kokutai no Hongi" also emphasized orthodoxy of oracles and the unbroken Imperial line in the opening sentence.
sen.cmt: 国体の本義の定訳不明

sen.e: The "Kokutai no Hongi" also emphasized the orthodoxy of oracles and the unbroken Imperial line in its opening sentence.

sen.j: 昭和維新を標榜した一連の変革運動でも、君民一体の思想から、天皇による直接支配こそ社会の閉塞をうちやぶるものであり、「君側の奸」がそれを妨げているという主張がなされた。
sen.e: In a series of transformative movements which aimed Showa Restoration, activists insisted from the viewpoint that the Emperor was the symbol of the unity of people, Emperor's direct reign of Japan could open a closed society, but "Wily vassals surrounding the Emperor" caused criticism against it.

In a series of transformative movements which shaped the Showa Restoration, activists insisted from the viewpoint that the Emperor was the symbol of the unity of people, Emperor's direct reign of Japan could open a closed society, but "Wily vassals surrounding the Emperor" caused criticism against it.
sen.cmt: shapedの方が良いと思います。定冠詞が必要です。

sen.cmt: クォーテーション調整

sen.j: この問題により、万世一系をめぐる論争は、天皇制の問題と結びついて大きな広がりを持つことになる。
sen.e: After that, the issue of the unbroken Imperial line was connected with the issue of the emperor system, and it fueled disputes over them.

tit.e: Issue of succession to the Imperial throne
The issue of succession to the Imperial throne
The issue of succession to the Imperial throne

sen.j: 第二次世界大戦後、愛子内親王などの皇族の女子が誕生する一方で、秋篠宮文仁親王誕生以降は悠仁親王の誕生まで約40年もの間皇族の男子が誕生せず、皇位継承の権利を持つ皇族の男子が不足している。
sen.e: After the World War II, the Imperial family had some princesses such as Imperial Princess Aiko, but no prince was born for about 40 years since the birth of Imperial Prince Akishinonomiya Fumihito and now no one could have the right of succeeding to the Imperial throne.

After World War II, the Imperial family had princesses such as Imperial Princess Aiko, but no prince was born for about 40 years since the birth of Imperial Prince Akishinonomiya Fumihito and now no one could have the right to succeed to the Imperial throne.
sen.cmt: 不要な箇所を削除しました。一部、前置詞等を修正しました。
sen.e: After World War II, the Imperial family had princesses such as Imperial Princess Aiko, but no prince was born for about 40 years since the birth of Imperial Prince Akishinonomiya Fumihito and now no one could have the right to succeed to the Imperial throne.

sen.j: このため、皇室典範が早期に改正され、女性天皇が誕生する可能性が高まっていた。
sen.e: It raised the possibility that the Imperial House Act could be modified soon and a female emperor would appear.
It raised the possibility that the Imperial House Act could be modified soon and that a female emperor would appear.
It raised the possibility that the Imperial House Act could be modified soon and that a female emperor would appear.

sen.j: このことを背景に、皇統の女系天皇を容認しようとする皇室典範に関する有識者会議などの動きがある。
sen.e: As a result of this successor problem, a meeting of intellectuals can be held to discuss the modification of the Imperial House Act so as to enable princesses to succeed to the Imperial Throne.
As a result of this successor problem, a meeting of intellectuals can be held to discuss the modification of the Imperial House Act so as to enable princesses to succeed to the Imperial Throne.

sen.j: だが、万世一系の伝統が断絶するとして、反対する意見が強く、女系容認には至っていない。
sen.e: However, still many people are opposed to female emperors for the reason that the theory of the unbroken Imperial line will be breached.
However, many people are still opposed to female emperors for the reason that the theory of the unbroken Imperial line will be breached.

sen.j: トンガを支配する王朝もまた、神話に繋がる万世一系の王朝とされる。
sen.e: The Tongan dynasty is also unbroken and has lasted since mythological ages.
